data.text:
Had such a great vacation Rashid was brilliant,, he made our holiday so enjoyable 
Such a great vacation with Rashid making us feel relaxed,, greeting us with a smile each and every day. No request too big or too small. Will miss his attentiveness to our every need. A real asset to Wyndham Dubai Marina.
data.title: Rashid

data.text:
The most amazing host 
Rashid is so friendly and attentive 
So goood at service 
Always greets us with a smile 
Nothing is too much trouble and he made our stay very special 
He is an asset to the hotel
We had such a wonderful time with him 
And will miss him
data.title: Rashid top man

data.text:
Stayed here for 1 week. By far the best hospitality I have received from a hotel. The place was exceptionally clean and the staff couldn't do enough for us they were brilliant. We would stay again.

The hotel is only a 2 minute walk from the marina
data.title: Exeptional for the price

user_location.name: Swansea, Swansea County, South Wales, Wales

data.text:
Everything is fine, especially Augusto is a nice guy cleaning the room. He was always interested in what I needed, if everything was okay. Very attentive and helpful. 

The hotel itself is old, the common areas are very dirty. The room on the road is very noisy.
data.title: Nice

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Svetlana C,

Thank you for taking the time to share with us your experience at Wyndham Dubai Marina. It is a pleasure to receive positive feedback and rewarding for us to know that your overall stay was a pleasant one. We are grateful for your praise on the service of Augusto. 

We appreciate your constructive comments, your input is invaluable in helping us to make improvements and to provide the best possible experience for our guests. 

We look forward to hosting you again. 

Best wishes,
Bianca Virkus
owner_response.author: Bianca Virkus

data.text: Rashid who cares for the Club Lounge was the star of our stay. For 6 days he looked after us, with lovely food, always topping our glasses up. Rashid made our holiday ðŸ˜Š. Always there to great us with a warm, happy smile. An absolute credit to the hotel. Make sure you pay a little extra for the Club Lounge too.
data.title: Rashid is a legend !

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tim W,

Thank you for your encouraging review. It is rewarding to know that you had a wonderful experience. We are delighted to know that Rashid left such a positive impression during your stay. 

Your kind words will be shared with him, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another excellent experience.  

Best wishes,
Bianca Virkus
owner_response.author: Bianca Virkus
